thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 3 of 3553
thread.title: AberdeenGal

author: AberdeenGal
title: AberdeenGal
text: I always find the books I can't find anywhere else. The customer service is great! The books arrive quickly and always in better shape than I ordered. I love the no shipping if you order over $10 and the Rewards program. A friend recommended Thriftbooks to me and it turned out it was a great tip! I am a big book buyer and Thriftbooks saves me money!
